cause.description:
GO DOWN PUB. HAVE GOOD TIME AND GET STUPIDLY DRUNK. THIS IS A VERY WORTHY CAUSE AND CAN BE SUPPORTED IN YOUR OWN LOCAL OR MINE. IF YOU CHOOSE MINE YOU WILL HAVE TO SUPPORT ME OR CARRY BY THE END OF THE NIGHT
1. THERE IS TOO MUCH BOOZE FOR LEFT
2. DONT LET ME PICKLE MY LIVER ALONE
3. EVERYONE SHOULD BE DRUNK LEAST ONCE A DAY
cause.name: VISIT THE PUB OFTEN
